verses.text: HALELU‘IA! Hiva ki he ‘Eiki ‘aki ha hiva fo‘ou, Fai hono fakamālō ‘i he fakataha ‘o ‘ene kau lotu.
Ke fakafiefia ‘a ‘Isileli ‘i he ‘Afio na‘a ne ngaohi ia: Ke tome‘e ‘a ha‘a Saione ‘i honau tu‘i na,
Ke nau fakamālō‘ia hono huafa ‘i he me‘e: Ke nau hiva kiate ia ‘i he tā lali mo e ha‘ape.
He ‘oku mahu‘inga‘ia ‘a Sihova ‘i hono kakai; Te ne ‘ai ke faka‘ofo‘ofa ‘a e kau kātaki ‘aki ‘a e fakamo‘ui.
‘E hākailangitau ‘a e kau lotu koe‘uhi ko e lāngilangi ko ia: Te nau hiki mavava ‘i honau mohenga.
Ko e fakahīkihiki‘i ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘i honau kia, Mo e heletā fakatoumata ‘i honau nima.
Ke fai sauni ki he Senitaile, ‘A e ngaahi tautea ki he ngaahi fa‘ahinga kehe.
Ke ha‘i seini honau ngaahi tu‘i, Mo honau hou‘eiki ‘aki ‘a e ‘aione kii‘i.
Ke fakaai kiate kinautolu ‘a e tautea kuo tohia: Ko e lāngilangi ia ‘o ‘ene kau lotu kotoa. HALELU‘IA!
